nodes.text: Voolattar was a male Duros Chief Engineer of the Sith Empire living during the Galactic War. In 3639 BBY he was stationed in Section X on Belsavis, where general Avrun sent him to assist an Imperial with recovering an HK-51 series assassin droid from the wreckage of the Fatality.
Voolattar appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Imperial quest "Fatal Errors" in Section X.
